settings_description: Settings language and display theme for the application.
comment_1: I'm over 20 years old and I've never seen a service like this, so I booked for a few times.
comment_2: Normally I clean myself, but I'm busy so I tried to book a service to see how it is, and I became a regular customer. The furniture was cleaned thoroughly, the floor was clean and shiny, even the corners that I didn't think of were cleaned +1 for the spot.
comment_3: Since I first heard about DomiCare's service, I no longer have to worry about my wife yelling at me for not cleaning up, and my wife loves me again because the cleaning is no longer dirty. Thank you very much for the service.
coming_soon_description: We are working to bring you the best experience.
history_description: Manage and review your past service bookings
